about_the_game:
A role playing game about growing plants to heal the environment in real time. Gather your crew, upgrade your ship, and build a better future for the inhabitants of the eight rings.

Key Features


Grow plants in a living world


  • Grow lush gardens and harvest plants from your farm in real time
  • Plants can heal you, recycle junk, create light, repel monsters and much more!
  • A complex ecological simulation controls the growth of plants // controls the flora and fauna of the game worlds


Friendship and romance


  • A diverse and entertaining set of crew members to rescue who will hang out on your starship, all with their own quests
  • Friendship and romance any of them… unless you annoy them with your choices!


Explore and discover the universe


  • A unique setting in a ring system with over 100 fragment worlds to explore
  • More than 200 plants and 50 creatures to collect
  • Win gardening competitions
  • Rescue cute animal friends
  • Hatch animal eggs
  • Investigate magnetic storms
  • Defend towns from mysterious creatures
  • Grow LOTS of plants!
  • Collect rare meteorites after meteor storms
  • Use phosphorescent plants to light up the dark
  • Use carnivorous plants to defend your crops from bugs
  • Charge devices with solarflowers
  • Clean up the world with pollution-absorbing plants
  • Open greenhouses to find rare plants
  • Unlock mysterious sites with your plant collection
  • And many more!
